","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1533020842303,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48243","entityId":"25-2049112","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48243"},{"name":"summary","value":"Activity stream loaders are not flashing while waiting to start receiving response"},{"name":"description","value":"

2018.2.43478

tl;dr any activity stream tab won't flash during Waiting phase of request to backend (in terms of HAR / network monitor).

STR:

  1. Open any SIV
  2. Toggle off activity stream history tab.
  3. Throttle activity stream endpoint for that issue down to 10bps
  4. Switch activity stream history on.

Expected result: history activity stream icon starts flashing shortly.
Actual result: you have to wait for a long time until history icon starts flashing. See attached screencap: it starts to flash after about 1 minute of wait.

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1531492789051"},{"name":"updated","value":"1533548634031"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"rekolobov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Roman Kolobov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-731","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Verified by","value":[{"value":"rekolobov","fullName":"Roman Kolobov"}]},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 73","id":"YouTrack:sprint 73"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"video.mp4","id":"74-545120","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/video.mp4?file=74-545120&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-46057","entityId":"25-1881434","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"46057"},{"name":"summary","value":"New UI: "Load more" is irritating for issues with many comments"},{"name":"description","value":"
Recently YouTrack has changed how comment paging works. Before the change I was able to quickly access last comments, read them, and reply. Now I have to click "Load more" until I finally access the desired comment. More over, the issue doesn't remember I clicked "Load more" several times, and next time I visit this page I will clicking again. Could you please fix such behavior and provide quick access to last comments as old YouTrack had?

Demo issue https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/JRE-526
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1519987891543"},{"name":"updated","value":"1533548634022"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"kb"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Konstantin Bulenkov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"4"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-922","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"JT-45884","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"JT-48372","type":"Depend","role":"depends on"},{"value":"YTB-922","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 73","id":"YouTrack:sprint 73"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image1520263567002.png","id":"74-499285","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image1520263567002.png?file=74-499285&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2731102","author":"mazine","authorFullName":"Maxim Mazin","issueId":"JT-46057","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Dmitry Gizatov, @Maksim Ryzhikov, @Alexander Anisimov: I guess in «oldest first» mode "load more" should be on the top and should load older comments.
